meanings.definition: Of or relating to appetite or desire for food.
meanings.sent1: The orectic child eagerly devoured the delicious meal in front of him.
meanings.sent2: Her orectic cravings led her to constantly think about food.
meanings.sent3: The orectic puppy couldn't resist the temptation of the tasty treats on the table.
meanings.sent4: His orectic passion for cooking drove him to experiment with new recipes every day.
meanings.sent5: The orectic aroma of freshly baked bread filled the kitchen, making everyone hungry.

meanings.definition: A person who has an excessive desire for food.
meanings.sent1: The orectic at the buffet kept going back for more servings.
meanings.sent2: She felt like an orectic whenever she visited her favorite bakery.
meanings.sent3: The orectic in the group always knew the best places to eat in town.
meanings.sent4: Being an orectic, he never missed a chance to try out new restaurants.
meanings.sent5: The orectic's eyes lit up at the sight of the dessert menu, eager to indulge in sweet treats.
